title: Adverse News Related to J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
reasoning: Reports indicate significant legal and reputational risks for J.P. Morgan due to multiple enforcement actions and penalties.
news:
1. [J.P. Morgan to Pay $150M to Settle Slew of SEC Charges - Wealth Management](https://www.wealthmanagement.com/regulation-compliance/j-p-morgan-to-pay-150m-to-settle-slew-of-sec-charges) - J.P. Morgan will pay more than $150 million to settle a myriad of SEC charges.

2. [SEC.gov | JP Morgan Affiliates to Pay $151 Million to Resolve SEC ...](https://www.sec.gov/newsroom/press-releases/2024-178) - The SEC charged J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and J.P. Morgan Investment Management Inc. for misleading disclosures and other failures.

3. [SEC announces charges, $151 million penalties against JPMorgan ...](https://www.securitieslaw.com/blog/2024/11/sec-announces-charges-151-million-penalties-against-jpmorgan-affiliates/) - A combined $151 million will be paid to resolve enforcement actions involving misconduct.

4. [CFTC Orders J.P. Morgan to Pay $200m for Supervision Errors](https://www.marketsmedia.com/cftc-orders-j-p-morgan-to-pay-200m-for-supervision-failures/) - J.P. Morgan Securities LLC was ordered to pay $200 million for failing to supervise its business adequately.
